EmailTemplate.name: 2012-Q4_Vision_TB_CSS.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Please Tell Us How We're Doing
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please Tell Us How We're Doing
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Client}},
We realize it is you – our clients – who define our reputation and success. We’re committed to serving you and delivering the best solutions and products in the industry.
Please take a few minutes and complete our Customer Satisfaction Survey. Your feedback matters and we count on it.
Click here. <https://survey.qualtrics.com/SE/?SID=SV_7ZN3rkNGHLEb9fT>
Thank you! Tommy Blackwell Client Account Manager, Sales
